page.title: 12My Clothes.
page.content: For school I wear a skirt, a T-shirt and a jumper. In the summer I come in a dress or skirt and change into a PE-skirt or shorts. A PE-skirt is one that is not as long as a normal skirt. With this I wear a T-shirt. In winter I wear jeans and a jumper. I come in wellies when the weather is bad. For summer I wear shoes or trainers. For summer underwear I wear pants and ankle socks. I wear vest, pants and tights in the winter. My hobby is Guides. I wear a blue blouse and skirt, a red tie and a blue hat, any coat and black shoes. For a disco I wear a short skirt that is joined on to a baggy jumper.My best outfit is jeans, a jumper and trainers. By Helen Judd aged 11.
